text: Middle East Professional Boxing Comission (MEPB) is an organization that manages professional boxing events in the Middle East. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates (UAE). The MEPB organizes boxing competitions, ensures that all matches follow proper rules, and works to keep the sport safe for participants. The organization operates across the Middle East, including countries like Saudi Arabia, UAE, Kuwait, and Qatar. It oversees major boxing events and ensures the sport is fair and transparent. The MEPB is the sole approved boxing commission in the region and collaborates closely with major international boxing organizations, including the WBC, WBA, IBF, and WBO. == Some well-known events hosted by the MEPB include: == *The Oleksandr Usyk vs. Anthony Joshua 2 fight in Saudi Arabia (2022). *Jamel Herring vs. Carl Frampton in Dubai, UAE (2021). *Bivol vs. Ramirez in Abu Dhabi, UAE (2022). *Tyson Fury vs. Oleksandr Usyk Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. (2023) == Awards == In 2022, MEPB was awarded the WBC Professional Boxing Commission of the Year honor. == References == Category:2016 establishments Category:Boxing Category:Sports organizations by sport
title: Middle East Professional Boxing
